</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set maximum ambient traffic draw distance (in 2D). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setTrafficDistance''' distance </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> distance: [[Number]] - draw distance (in meter) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on December 2, 2011 - 10:58
<dt class="note">[[User:Master85|Master85]]<dd class="note">The distance is not to the drawn traffic itself but to the road section - i.e. the ambient traffic on a long road section which is only partially within the drawing distance is drawn entirely.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
